'''{{pagename nd}}''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Sister to [Weto](/weto/), Tipa is adamant about upholding their Huana traditions and rejecting the aid of the Rauataians at [Sayuka](/sayuka/), after a series of storms wiped out their village and food supply. Tipa fears that accepting the aid - and the Rauataian way of life - will spell the end of Huana culture, caste divisions and all. She especially abhors the Rauataians forcing ''unity'' and ''equality'' among the Huana by quartering them all in one longhouse. 

## Interactions

}}
